replies.body:
We originally wanted to do this for PROJECT: Fiora but didn't have the time, so when another Fiora skin rolled around it's an opportunity (I say opportunity because it usually requires Rioters doing work on their own time to make these little things happen) to do little QoL changes - kinda like with Draven. Last year we made a new Q decal for Pool Party Draven and thought it would be great to go back and add unique Q indicators to his other skins, but again it was a nice idea we didn't have bandwidth for. So when Beast Hunter Draven was in the works we took the time to go back and add those in.

I hope players really dig these little touches, but also understand why we can't always do everything. But please keep letting us know all the same because you never know when a suggestion might spark something!

...I don't suppose that whenever Karthus happens to get  a new skin (either God or Riot KateyKhaos knows when that'll be),if we could get some VFX changes to one or a couple of his other skins? (probably his Statue skin)

I'd say not due to the tier of those old skins being low. Also it's more about adding things we felt were always meant to be there rather than new things. He is one of the few champions that doesn't have a skin with vfx though, so I hope we can do something cool for him in the future.
Arcade Karthus would be pretty sick
The Teemo thing means nothing, it's just if project Fiora is going to be a 1350 skin it's joke better not be the basic thing. Like how does that not make sense to people?
you ruin everything. you know that?
Or Teemo is Satan and nobody wants anything to do with him. Ever think of that?

Teemo isn't really satan anymore. Thats just an old joke. I like going against him because most of em suck and are so squishy. 

People only hated playing against teemo and called him Satan because his shrooms used to last 10 minutes I think.

> [{quoted}](name=Arakadia,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=zeGYs6rB,comment-id=0001000000000001,timestamp=2016-07-02T21:07:59.225+0000)
>
> Teemo isn't really satan anymore. Thats just an old joke. I like going against him because most of em suck and are so squishy. 
> 
> People only hated playing against teemo and called him Satan because his shrooms used to last 10 minutes I think.

and? Teemo is still satan
It's an old joke that nubs use to hate on teemo.
That's not true, I love Teeto and I'm not diabolical at all!
Deep down you are disturbed, i promise it.
I don't hate teeto or love teeto but I would like to see a project skin for him. I play him occasionaly.

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/xC3Lxk8zJWU/hqdefault.jpg

what one fan made of a possible Project Teemo. Should be fun, but I'm hoping for better ideas for legendary skins.

I would absolutely love to have a project: teemo skin. The omega squad skin is a complete work of art. Nothing in league looks more cool than the enemy setting off explosive mines, only to be knifed in the face by a badass. Riot has truly made their best work with the super galaxy skins and the project skins. They are vibrant, they are brilliantly animated, they have the best splash art (in my opinion), and nothing strokes the ego more than decimating the enemy team with a flashy champion .the special effects on skins like these, are truly what make it worth getting. I know most players hate teemo (whether it's having a terrible one on your team, or playing against a good one) but I adore it when riot throws some love his way, so that players like myself can fuel the fires to the flames of hate (and look good doing it) besides no press is bad press. If no one can accept teemo for being the kind soul he is instead of the degenerate slime they've come to hate, I say this. I wouldn't have it any other way.
i like Teemo yeah he is an annoying champ, but he is good and i think a PROJECT skin for him would be sick. I don't really like his skins besides Omega is sick.
